trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SEQ_00<tab>The Ananta battlemaid is not one to be trifled with.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_000<tab>You look like a ssstrider in sssearch of comrades in need. If ssso, I have a tasssk for you.

TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_001<tab>I am a trainer, and I was told to expect new recruitsss thisss <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>, yet nary a one has come. Perhapsss they were given the wrong time or location. I do not know.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_002<tab>They number five in all, these would-be warriors. Sssend them unto me, should you chance to find them.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER_000_003<tab>With time, I can turn even the most haplesss milksssops into whirlwinds of death. But I cannot do thisss if sssaid farm boys do not come.

TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SOWASOWAUSOLDIER02637_000_010<tab>Oh bugger, you were sent by the snake, weren't you!? I heard one in four recruits doesn't live through their training. That can't be true, right? Oh bugger, oh bugger...

TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_SINGANSOLDIER02637_000_011<tab>Ah. A thousand pardons. So preoccupied was I by the question of whether Ala Mhigo should be a monarchy or republic that I neglected to attend my training. How silly, I know─until we drive the imperials from our lands, the question is moot.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_BRAVESOLDIER02637_000_012<tab>I know, I know. I'm late. But I had to say a prayer for my sister first. After what the imperials did to her, death was a mercy...
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_YOUNGSOLDIER02637_000_013<tab>Huh? Training? Gah! I was so busy practicing to impress the others that I completely forgot! Thank you!

TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_YANGSOLDIER02637_000_014<tab>The teacher calls for me? I see. We were discussing strategies for disabling magitek armor, you see, and... Ah, yes, of course, there is no time. If you would excuse me.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_020<tab>All recruitsss are presssent and accounted for. My thanksss to you, ssstrider.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_021<tab>Not all appreciate the rigor with which I train my recruitsss. Sssome favor a gentler approach. As if the imperials will be ssso kind.
TEXT_STMBDZ003_02637_ANANTASOLDIER02637_000_022<tab>'Tis a thanklesss job, to teach, sssome sssay. But I sssay their sssurvival is thanksss enough. Fare you well.
